ai-tha-ap367:0.3_0: She was the Lord of the Planet
ai-tha-ap367:1.2_0: a corruption of the mind, then the corrupted one.
ai-tha-ap367:2.1_0: Seeing a one with an ornament,
ai-tha-ap367:2.3_0: Having gone to the Awakened One
ai-tha-ap367:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap367:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap367:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Siṅgālaka.
